affiliation_name: Hangzhou Hongyuan Imp. & Exp. CO., Limited
tag_list: hss-cutting-blade, hss-cutter, glass-cutter, diamond-dresser, diamond-grinding-wheel, pcd-insert, pcbn-insert, pu-foam-sealant
overview:
Zhejiang Hongyuan Hardware Imp. & Exp. CO., Limited is specialized in designing, producing and trading kinds of power tools and power tool accessories. Thanks to the supreme quality, fast delivery and throughout good services, our products of HSS cutting blades, T.C.T Router bit, Diamond tools, Natural PCD/PCBN insert and one-component PU foam sealant have been sold well to Taiwan, Korea, Canada, Italy, Brazil, etc..

Our company is well renowned for efficient and scientific management, advanced equipment and precise technology. Main roducts are characterized in durability, stability and good performance in HSS cutting blades, T.C.T circular saw blades, T.C.T Router bit, PCD/PCBN insert, glass cutter, diamond dressers, diamond grinding wheel, diamond files, diamond mounded bits, diamond pastes; Winter foam sealant, All-season foam sealant, Fire-resistance foam sealant, foam cleaner and foam gun, etc..

With the tenet of ” Quality First, Credit Forever and Custom Foremost “, we are looking forward to establish long-term business relations with you for mutual benefits.

firm.name: Hangzhou Hongyuan Imp. & Exp. CO., Limited

milestones.description: Product line of Diamond Grinding Wheel: Taper Cup grinding wheel, Dished grinding wheel, Plain grinding wheel, Two Tap-side grinding wheel, Cupculate grinding wheel, etc.

Customized sizes are welcome.
Professional producter of kinds of T.C.T Router Bits, such as Straight bit, V Groove bit, Core Box bit, Ogee bit, Beading bit, Classical bit, Flush Trim bit, Slot Cutting bit,Chamfer bit, etc.
